attributes.description:
This vehicle is Ideal for Uber and Bolt businesses. It is also perfect for anyone who wants a daily Run Around vehicle for their family. It has an amazing fuel consumption, in Excellent condition and mileage below 50000KM. With the great feel of comfort, this vehicle will not disappoint you.
It has specs and extra features including a Power Steering Wheel,  Air Conditioning, Clothes Seats, Central Locking,  Air Bags, ABS Brakes, Smash and Grab, Electric Windows, Radio, AUX/USB and Bluetooth Connectivity,
Spare Keys and a Service History are available.
Any vehicle bought from us will receive a Premium Valet to the value of R750 before delivery. We take pride in being a family owned and operated business that always refer to our founding principles of integrity, honesty and fairness. With those principles in mind we set out with a customer-centric approach that allows ease of access to the vehicle of your dreams just 5 days or less. We connect customers to any of the major financial institutions in South Africa with an 87% approval rate for potential family members that meet the minimum requirements for financing. With us Service is not a Department, it's in our DNA! We welcome Trade-ins! Trading Hours: Monday - Friday : 8AM to 5PM Saturday & Public Holiday : 8AM to 1PM Sunday : CLOSED Price EXCLUDES Administration, License and Registration Fees.
